title: I downloaded a match due to a toxic person for the 5th match TODAY in RANKED but it's not even
body: showing the ROFL file and funnily enough Riot Support won't let me upload them directly anymore (saying connection lost, it's taking too long and etc  but I'm not losing connection) after the 3rd report and I've had to send them via email instead but now my downloads aren't even showing up in the ROFL document for me to send anymore, I've already tried deleting a few and nothing, is there anyway to redownload the match or has it gone to another location? 9-14 troll matches in a row almost, even with wins now.

replies.body: It definitely has nothing to do with you going ghost flash every game and not sticking to a role.

> [{quoted}](name=DÃ©sired Name,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=kB5tm0y9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-14T21:41:55.355+0000)
>
> It definitely has nothing to do with you going ghost flash every game and not sticking to a role.

yeah, I carry it for extra escape or running down enemies so I don't have to rely on anybody at all but still help until 1hp then juke/kite away, I even don't buy boots  for extra stats to make up for their feeding sometimes, they still throw hard https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/NBhEWAwE-i-just-met-a-weirdly-disturbing-shen?comment=00010000000100000000
